com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache

Class ScaleoutCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache.ScaleoutCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.cache.CacheManager

    public class ScaleoutCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.cache.CacheManager
    CacheManager implementation used to create ScaleoutCaches.
